content:
robert Marshall Assistant Sports EditorApril  

The Bear Cubs baseball team   sixgame win streak was snapped after a  lost against Modesto Junior College April  PERIOD

With Dane Erbst on third after two MJCs errors Anthony Bender grounded a double play allowing Erbst to score for the Bear Cubs making the score  in the top of the second PERIOD

The Pirates responded back when Stefan Aguilar hit in Joe Pedlowe to tie the game at one apiece in the bottom of the second PERIOD

It was a stalemate until MJC scored three runs in the bottom of the sixth PERIOD

Kaden Cline scored when Aaron Pangilinan singled putting the Pirates up by one PERIOD

Patrick Mulry scored after Pedlowe singled PERIOD

Pangilian scored after Stefan Aguilar doubled making the score  MJC PERIOD

The Bear Cubs had one more chance to tie the game in the top of the ninth PERIOD

Weston Bryan scored after a Parker Shaw hit bringing the Bear Cubs within three that was all SRJC could do as they fell losing only its ninth game of the season PERIOD

We did not swing the bats well enough to win said head coach Damon Neidlinger PERIOD They had opportunities and did not get the timely hit. the Bear Cubs sit second in the Big  conference PERIOD One game behind San Joaquin Delta PERIOD

SRJC wraps up its regular season with a threegame series against Sierra College starting April  PERIOD
